message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
Meet me in the middle, let's start with an equal split
I'd rather try to get a better deal than meet in the middle
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still thinking I deserve more!
You're getting a bit too greedy, I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share
I think I can live with this deal, it's getting harder to wait
